Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_open_3D_object

The function AIL_open_3D_object opens a 3D object for the specified M3D provider.

H3DPOBJECT AIL_open_3D_object(
  HPROVIDER m3d
);

In Parameters

m3d
indicates the M3D library to obtain the 3D object handle from.

Returns

A handle to a 3D object.

Discussion

A 3D object is any object that isn't a sound emitter or a listener.

3D objects are objects that neither emit sound (like a 3D sample) nor hear sound (like the listener). A 3D object would be something like a wall or other object that sound could reflect or reverberate off of. None of the existing M3D providers support 3D objects, but advanced 3D sound systems coming in the future may support these.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_close_3D_object
Related Basic Types: H3DPOBJECT, HPROVIDER
